instructions:
Place above ingredients in casserole and bake uncovered in 325-degree oven for 2 hours. During last
hour, stir every 20 minutes. Serves 4.

This recipe may be doubled or tripled, however bake 2 1/4 hours if doubled or 2 1/2 hours if tripled.
